name: Osaurus Vision
description: macOS Vision framework integration for image analysis, text detection, face detection, background removal, and more

tools.name: detect_text
tools.description: Detect and recognize text in an image or PDF using OCR. Returns detected text blocks with bounding boxes and confidence scores.

tools.name: detect_document
tools.description: Detect document boundaries in an image or PDF. Returns corner points for perspective correction.

tools.name: detect_barcodes
tools.description: Detect and decode barcodes and QR codes in an image or PDF.

tools.name: detect_faces
tools.description: Detect faces in an image. Optionally includes facial landmarks (eyes, nose, mouth, face contour).

tools.name: detect_rectangles
tools.description: Detect rectangular shapes in an image. Useful for finding documents, cards, screens.

tools.name: classify_image
tools.description: Classify an image using Apple's built-in classifier. Returns labels with confidence scores.

tools.name: detect_horizon
tools.description: Detect the horizon angle in an image. Useful for auto-rotating tilted photos.

tools.name: detect_body_pose
tools.description: Detect human body poses. Returns 19 joint positions for each detected person.

tools.name: detect_hand_pose
tools.description: Detect hand poses. Returns finger joint positions and hand chirality (left/right).

tools.name: detect_animals
tools.description: Detect animals (cats and dogs) in an image with labels and bounding boxes.

tools.name: blur_faces
tools.description: Detect and blur all faces in an image for privacy protection.

tools.name: auto_crop
tools.description: Automatically crop an image to focus on the most salient region.

tools.name: generate_saliency_map
tools.description: Generate a visual saliency heatmap showing areas of interest.

tools.name: remove_background
tools.description: Remove the background from an image, keeping only the foreground. Outputs transparent PNG.

tools.name: get_pdf_info
tools.description: Get information about a PDF file including page count, dimensions, and encryption status. Use this before processing PDFs to determine how many pages exist.
